name: The Hugging Ring
description:
The Hugging Ring is a cute, turn-based hugging competition where the goal is to increase your opponent’s HP (Hug Power) to maximum!  By spending your HP, you can use a variety of moves with different effects.  Some moves will increase your opponent’s HP, while others will increase the crowd’s Audience Power!  When the Audience Power meter gets filled, the player who maxed out the meter will get more HP, so be careful how often you hype up the crowd!

Did your opponent fill up your HP first?  Don’t give up!  If you’re struggling to be the hugging champion, you will get a boost to your stats for games after losses.  Keep trying, and soon you will be the hugging champion!  And remember: everybody wins in a hugging competition!
